paper_abstract: A new pair of linear operators is introduced into the partially implicit but largely explicit time advance algorithm for the MHD equations in the M3D code. These operators jointly render the algorithm implicit with respect to propagation of the shear Alfven wave to leading order. As a result, the maximum stable time step is increased by up to a factor of three for many practical applications. The additional computational cost is trivial for the linear mode of operation and adds only approximately 30% additional execution time per step for nonlinear calculations. (c) 2010 Elsevier B.V. paper_title: Implementation of an implicit shear Alfven operator in the M3D code
